44 WMAdmittance::WMAdmittance() :
45  ConfigManager("Admittance")
46 {
47  // Start the reconfigure server
48  init();
49 
50  // Retrieve joint names configuration
51  aAdmittanceNode.getParam("wm_admittance/joint_names", aJointNames);
52 
53  // Retrieve link names for each joint
54  std::vector<std::string> lLinkNames;
55  for (const std::string& lJointName : aJointNames)
56  {
57  std::vector<std::string> lLinkName;
58  aAdmittanceNode.getParam("wm_admittance/" + lJointName, lLinkName);
59  lLinkNames.emplace_back(std::move(lLinkName[0]));
60  }
61 
62  // Create unique instance of gravity model
63  aGravityModel = std::make_unique<WMGravityModel>(lLinkNames, 7);
64 
65  // Create transfer function
66  aDiscreteTF = std::make_unique<DiscreteTransferFunction>(
67  ros::package::getPath(gPackageName) + "/config/filter_admittance.yaml");
68 
69  // Initialize public admittance velocity
70  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
71  {
72  aAdmittanceVelocityMap.emplace(lJointName, 0.0f);
73  }
74 
75  // Subscribe to the joint_state to obtain current efforts applied on joints
76  aJointStateSub = aAdmittanceNode.subscribe("joint_states", 1, &WMAdmittance::jointStateCallback, this);
77 }
78 
83 WMAdmittance* WMAdmittance::getInstance()
84 {
85  WMAdmittance* lInstance = aInstance.load(std::memory_order_acquire);
86  if (!lInstance)
87  {
88  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lLock(aMutex);
89  lInstance = aInstance.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
90  if(!lInstance)
91  {
92  lInstance = new WMAdmittance();
93  aInstance.store(lInstance, std::memory_order_release);
94  }
95  }
96  return lInstance;
97 }
98 
104 double WMAdmittance::getAdmittanceVelocityFromJoint(const std::string& pJointName) const
105 {
106  double lVelocity = 0.0f;
107  const auto& lIter = aAdmittanceVelocityMap.find(pJointName);
108  if (lIter != aAdmittanceVelocityMap.end())
109  {
110  lVelocity = lIter->second;
111  }
112  return lVelocity;
113 }
114 
121 void WMAdmittance::process()
122 {
123  if (isAdmittanceEnabled())
124  {
125  std::vector<double> lAdmittanceTorque =
126  calculateAdmittanceTorque(aGravityModel->process());
127 
128  updateAdmittanceVelocity(
129  aDiscreteTF->updateVector(Eigen::Map<Eigen::VectorXd>(lAdmittanceTorque.data(), lAdmittanceTorque.size())));
130 
131  if (aVerboseMode)
132  {
133  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
134  {
135  ROS_INFO("Velocity of %s: %lf", lJointName.c_str(), getAdmittanceVelocityFromJoint(lJointName));
136  }
137  }
138  }
139 }
140 
148 void WMAdmittance::onDynamicReconfigureChange(const AdmittanceConfig& pConfig)
149 {
150  aEnableAdmittance = pConfig.enableAdmittance;
151  aVerboseMode = pConfig.verboseMode;
152 }

189 void WMAdmittance::jointStateCallback(const sensor_msgs::JointState& pMsg)
190 {
191  if (!aFirstCheck)
192  {
193  aFirstCheck = true;
194  for (const auto& lMapItem : aAdmittanceVelocityMap)
195  {
196  bool lJointNamePresent = false;
197  for (const auto& lJointName : pMsg.name)
198  {
199  if (lMapItem.first == lJointName)
200  {
201  lJointNamePresent = true;
202  break;
203  }
204  }
205 
206  if (!lJointNamePresent)
207  {
208  ROS_ERROR("WMAdmittance: Joint '%s' is not present in topic /joint_states.", lMapItem.first.c_str());
209  throw std::runtime_error("WMAdmittance: Joint '" + lMapItem.first + "' is not present in topic /joint_states.");
210  }
211  }
212  }
213  else
214  {
215  aJointState = pMsg;
216  }
217 }
218 
223 void WMAdmittance::updateAdmittanceVelocity(const std::vector<double>& pAdmittanceVelocity)
224 {
225  size_t lIndex = 0;
226  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
227  {
228  aAdmittanceVelocityMap[lJointName] = pAdmittanceVelocity[lIndex];
229  ++lIndex;
230  }
231 }
232 
238 std::vector<double> WMAdmittance::calculateAdmittanceTorque(const std::vector<double>& pCompensatedTorque)
239 {
240  size_t lIndex = 0;
241  std::vector<double> lAdmittanceTorque;
242  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
243  {
244  lAdmittanceTorque.emplace_back(getEffortFromJoint(lJointName) - pCompensatedTorque[lIndex]);
245  ++lIndex;
246  }
247  return lAdmittanceTorque;
248 }
249 
255 double WMAdmittance::getEffortFromJoint(const std::string& pJointName) const
256 {
257  size_t lIndex = 0;
258  double lEffort = 0.0f;
259  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointState.name)
260  {
261  if (lJointName == pJointName)
262  {
263  lEffort = aJointState.effort[lIndex];
264  break;
265  }
266  ++lIndex;
267  }
268 }
